short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for learning and refreshing memorized card stacks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A helper extension for magicians who do memorized deck work. The extension provides a quick-and-easy way to refresh your memory on your memorized stack at any time, using 'flash card' style memory techniques:

By clicking on the extension, a pop-up will appear showing you either the face of a card, or a number. You can then quiz yourself on the other side of the card, before clicking it and seeing the answer.

The extension also provides a Settings panel to configure the order of the deck of cards you are learning, and the format of the questions and answers.

For more details, see the write-up on Torn & Restored Magazine.
